children.name: controlled by another person or organization
trust fund
examples: an amount of money which is being controlled for
a person or organization by another person or organization
_There are some tax advantages in setting up a trust fund for each of your children.

children.name: trust
examples: trustnounLEGAL ARRANGEMENT
[ C ] a legal arrangement in which a person or organization controlsproperty and/or money for another person or organization
_Under the terms of the trust he receives interest onthe money, but he cannot get at the money itself.
_The money that her father left her is beingheld/
kept intrust (= being controlled) for her until she's 30.

children.name: money that is collected for a purpose
fund
children.definition: a large sum of money that is collected and kept, especially so that it can be used by a particular group of people who need it:
examples: quỹ
▪ There’s a special fund you can apply to, that pays for blind students to go to university.
▪ If I’m successful in raising over £500, those funds will go to the Bible School.
£400/$30,000 etc in funds
400 bảng Anh/ 30,000 đô la... trong quỹ
▪ A total of $5,800 in church funds has been used to provide assistance to local people.
set up a fund
thành lập quỹ
▪ They used this money to set up a fund for the refugees.
raise funds
gây quỹ
▪ The event was held to raise funds to promote AIDS awareness among young gays.
▪ The hand-sewn quilts will be sold at a Christmas Craft Fair to raise funds for the arts project.
appeal fund
quỹ quyên góp
a special fund that is set up to help someone who is ill, needs special help etc
▪ Supporters have set up an appeal fund to help Peter fight the case.
▪ Tell us, Gillian, how much do you have in the appeal fund now?
slush fund
quỹ đen
money that has been obtained secretly and illegally, and that is used for illegal purposes
▪ He is on trial for accepting kickbacks from business moguls to build his slush fund.
fundnoun kho; nguồn dự trữ quỹ
[ C ] a sum of money saved, collected or provided for a particular purpose
_apension/trustfund
_The hospital hasset upa special fund to buy new equipment.
_Contributions are being sought for the disaster fund.

children.name: kitty/pot
children.definition: a small sum of money that is collected from all the people in a group and used to buy their food or drinks, pay their bills etc:
examples: vốn góp chung
▪ ‘Are we having takeout tonight?’ ‘Depends how much is in the pot.’
▪ Do you all just put a bit in the kitty each week for basics?
▪ There’s nothing in the kitty, so if anyone wants another drink they’ll have to get it themselves.
